import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react" import axios from "axios" const Tugas12 = () =>{ const [dataMahasiswa,setDataMahasiswa] = useState() useEffect(() => { let fetch = async () => { try { let result = await axios.get(`https://backendexample.sanbercloud.com/api/student-scores`) setDataMahasiswa([...result.data]) } catch (error) { console.log(error) } } fetch() }, []) return( <>
